パッケージorg.apache.storm.kafkaの階層

パッケージ階層:
  • すべてのパッケージ

クラス階層

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.topology.base.BaseComponent (implements org.apache.storm.topology.IComponent)
      • org.apache.storm.topology.base.BaseRichSpout (implements org.apache.storm.topology.IRichSpout)
        • org.apache.storm.kafka.KafkaSpout
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.Broker (implements java.lang.Comparable<T>, java.io.Serializable)
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.ByteBufferSerializer (implements org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.Serializer<T>)
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.DynamicBrokersReader
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.DynamicPartitionConnections
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.ExponentialBackoffMsgRetryManager (implements org.apache.storm.kafka.FailedMsgRetryManager)
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.IntSerializer (implements org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.Serializer<T>)
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.KafkaConfig (implements java.io.Serializable)
      • org.apache.storm.kafka.SpoutConfig (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.KafkaUtils
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.KafkaUtils.KafkaOffsetMetric (implements org.apache.storm.metric.api.IMetric)
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.Partition (implements org.apache.storm.trident.spout.ISpoutPartition, java.io.Serializable)
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.PartitionManager
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.PartitionManager.OffsetData
    • org.apache.storm.spout.SchemeAsMultiScheme (implements org.apache.storm.spout.MultiScheme)
      • org.apache.storm.kafka.KeyValueSchemeAsMultiScheme
      • org.apache.storm.kafka.MessageMetadataSchemeAsMultiScheme
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.StaticCoordinator (implements org.apache.storm.kafka.PartitionCoordinator)
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.StaticHosts (implements org.apache.storm.kafka.BrokerHosts)
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.StaticPartitionConnections
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.StringMultiSchemeWithTopic (implements org.apache.storm.spout.MultiScheme)
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.StringScheme (implements org.apache.storm.spout.Scheme)
      • org.apache.storm.kafka.StringKeyValueScheme (implements org.apache.storm.kafka.KeyValueScheme)
      • org.apache.storm.kafka.StringMessageAndMetadataScheme (implements org.apache.storm.kafka.MessageMetadataScheme)
    • java.lang.Throwable (implements java.io.Serializable)
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.apache.storm.kafka.FailedFetchException
          • org.apache.storm.kafka.TopicOffsetOutOfRangeException
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.ZkCoordinator (implements org.apache.storm.kafka.PartitionCoordinator)
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.ZkHosts (implements org.apache.storm.kafka.BrokerHosts)
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.ZkState

インタフェース階層

  • org.apache.storm.kafka.PartitionCoordinator
  • java.io.Serializable
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.BrokerHosts
    • org.apache.storm.kafka.FailedMsgRetryManager
    • org.apache.storm.spout.Scheme
      • org.apache.storm.kafka.KeyValueScheme
      • org.apache.storm.kafka.MessageMetadataScheme

列挙型階層

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<E> (implements java.lang.Comparable<T>, java.io.Serializable)
      • org.apache.storm.kafka.KafkaError
